casebody.data:
BINNEY
v.
THERAPY PRODUCTS, et al. No. 431A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2007. Sharon A. Johnston, Huntsville, AL, for Employment Security Commission. Susan L. Evans, for Binney.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of May 2007 by Petitioner for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Petitioner (Binney) shall have up to and including the 7th day of June 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2007."
